thread.title: 22 Tumblr Posts You'll Nod In Agreement With If You're A Lady Who Likes Ladies
thread.title_full: 22 Tumblr Posts You'll Nod In Agreement With If You're A Lady Who Likes Ladies

author: Sarah Karlan
title: 22 Tumblr Posts You'll Nod In Agreement With If You're A Lady Who Likes Ladies
text:
Please forward to all television writers. ID: 9915988 9. This outrageous conversation that you actually can’t really relate to at all, but should pass along to all your friends: https://unfuck-it.tumblr.com/post/149969490794/someone-come-get-my-mother-please View this embed ›
ID: 9915997 10. This thread that any Barb fan will stand behind: View this image ›
justashadeoffcrazy.tumblr.com ID: 10414169 11. You before you came out: https://sapphic-feelings.tumblr.com/post/151259076763/me-visibly-annoyedangry-while-discussing-lgbt View this embed ›
ID: 9915992 12. And you now: https://phan-theft-autumn.tumblr.com/post/149530895263/me-im-so-fuckin-kicks-chair-gay-me-dude-im View this embed ›
ID: 9915982 13. And this post you can 100% relate to if you are now, or have ever been, single AF: https://skellydun.tumblr.com/post/152879896042/golfgalaxy-unc00l-golfgalaxy-i-wonder View this embed ›
ID: 9935237 14. That feeling when you discover a new show to binge: https://lezboblunt.tumblr.com/post/145483208509 View this embed ›
ID: 9916015 15. And this one too: https://clexabrasil.tumblr.com/post/155929226429/someone-you-should-watch-this-me-i-dont-know View this embed ›
ID: 10414173 16. Because frankly, it doesn’t take much to rope you in: https://elizaskylers.tumblr.com/post/131930588171/mesees-two-women-kissing-on-a-show-i-have-never View this embed ›
ID: 9932079 17. When it’s the holiday season but you’re tight on cash: View this image ›
tumblr.com ID: 10414203 18. This accurate representation of your personal coming out timeline: https://lez-believin.tumblr.com/post/152489271704/my-life-in-one-post View this embed ›
ID: 10414210 19. This nightmare turned epiphany: https://lezvice.tumblr.com/post/87237207980 View this embed ›
ID: 9932132 20. This little bloop: View this image ›
tumblr.com ID: 10414156 21. This award-winning speech: https://blackhawks-shuffle.tumblr.com/post/133998252547/being-queer-on-the-holidays View this embed ›
ID: 10414220 22. And, finally, this grandma who was sent to make everything all better: https://sunatjexd.tumblr.com/post/152997703419/i-told-my-grandma-i-was-bisexual-a-few-weeks-ago View this embed ›
ID: 10414194 * Nods head in agreement * View this image ›
tenor.co ID: 10415013 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Sarah Karlan is the Deputy LGBT Editor for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Sarah Karlan at sarah.karlan@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
